description: Developed for speed, performance and reliability, the Samsung SH-S223L/BEBS DVDRW Internal Drive is brimming with features to read the latest software titles and write on discs. Additionally, the Samsung SH-S223L/BEBS DVDRW Internal Drive supports powerful over-speed performance which allows writing with the high speed of 22X on a low cost 16X media. Not only does this device read and write with impeccable quality, but it also saves you money in the long run! The low noise and vibration control system for high speed allow the Samsung SH-S223L/BEBS DVDRW Internal Drive to fit comfortably in any home or office environment. Double OPC technology allows you to check not only the inner but also in the outer side of the disc, optimizing the laser power on each area in order to perform the most reliable disc writing. With high speed performance and quality you can depend on, the Samsung 22X SpeedPlus Serial ATA Internal DVD-Writer is a perfect addition to any system setup.
title: Samsung DVD+RW Optical Drive SH-S223L/BEBS
